entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:38 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
